comment.author: 65828372@N00
comment._content: This photograph appears in a NowPublic news story: Ron Mueck Exhibition by the Brooklyn Museum.

comment.author: 64348052@N00
comment._content:
I visited The Hirshhorn in DC last summer and
I am so happy to see more of Ron Mueck's art work.
I kept telling people about Mueck "Big Man" sculpture
but now I can visit the Brooklyn Museum with my friends for 
a simultaneous "Wow !" viewing.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: While the Hirshorn is undergoing renovation, they've loaned the Big Man to us.  After the exhibition tour, the piece will come back to the Brooklyn Museum for a little while and we are so happy to have the opportunity to show it here.
